summary: The video discusses a man named Anthony Lofredo from Montpellier, France, who identifies himself as 'Black Alien.' He has undergone extensive modifications to his body, including tattooing his entire body, numerous cosmetic surgeries (such as tongue, nose, ear, and finger removal), and even dyeing his teeth black and his sclera white. He has also had silicone implants inserted. Anthony claims he is only 46% complete in his transformation to become less human-like. His future plans reportedly include leg amputations and significant weight loss. Despite his self-harming behavior, he insists he has the freedom to live as he chooses, though he faces challenges like being asked to leave public places due to his appearance.
keywords: Anthony Lofredo, Black Alien, Montpellier, France, body modification, tattoos, cosmetic surgery, self-harm, freedom, transformation, alien, public rejection
